code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances, moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and Mental Health. he is having symptoms 1 x week, in spite of treatment. he is a 52 YO male cellist. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in his past denies any smoking o:Height 177 cm, Weight 57.4 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

content2.Unmatched: immediately before public appearances , moderate feelings

td.content: s:a 53 year old white male describes recurrent moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests over the past month. The pt reports moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 56.3 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.
